ul.li: 2007-09-09 - The Elk Press web site premieres

section.name: The Elk Press
section.p:
Welcome to the web site of the Elk Press project. The Elk Press is a reference implementation of
the Elk Framework
that simulates an sheet-fed offset printing press. The ambition of the Elk Press is to conform to the following
Interoperability Conformance Specifications (ICS)
, roles, and levels:

ul.li: MIS to Conventional Printing - Sheet Fed ICS, Version 1.3 (draft) -- Worker Role, Level 2
MIS to Conventional Printing - Sheet Fed ICS, Version 1.0 Rev A -- Worker Role, Level 2
Prepress to Conventional Printing ICS, Version 1.0 -- Worker Role, Level 1
